summary.item: Total 12+ Years of Web Development Experience
Experience in all stages of application development life cycle from conception to completion
Strong track record of translating business requirements into technical solutions
Leader with strong programming and analytical skills
Ability to work well in both a team environment and individual/remote environments
Excellent written and verbal communication skills

experience.title: UI Architect / Development Lead
experience.description: Architect, build and deploy front end applications with a focus on Angular, HTML5 and CSS3.

accomplishments.accomplishment: Responsible for choosing technology stack, hiring of development team and vendor management

experience.title: Senior UI Developer
experience.description: Working on a central user experience team, I assist in building and maintaining advanced Angular directives for a community of internal software developers.

accomplishments.accomplishment: Prototype components using various JavaScript libraries
Work very closely with UX and visual designers to create pixel perfect cross browser experiences

experience.title: Owner
experience.description: Worked as an independent consulting creating cutting edge user interfaces using modern JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3.

experience.title: Manager Front End
experience.description: Manager all front end development under the on a national (iheartradio) and local (local stations) umbrella
